resource.description: Resource representing an entry in the general ledger.

attribute.name: credit
attribute.comment: Amount credited to the general ledger for this ledger-account.
Always a positive number, zero if absent.

attribute.name: debit
attribute.comment: Amount debited to the general ledger for this ledger-account.
Always a positive number, zero if absent.

attribute.name: balance
attribute.comment: Net amount credited or debited to the general ledger for this ledger-account.

url.comment: Returns a listing of all resources available to caller.
